description: This file contains the CSS styles for the theme management of the Instagram clone frontend application, defining variables for light and dark themes and styling for various elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling for the application layout, including background color and text alignment.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the logo, including size and animation settings.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header element of the application, setting background color and layout properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, primarily color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the button that toggles between light and dark themes, including positioning and hover effects.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Animation keyframes for rotating the application logo.
